message: Starting registry corruption investigation - reading both registries
Analyzing agent processes vs registry - found 41 leaked processes and 5 zombie entries
Cross-referencing 8 active tmux sessions against 95 registered agents - examining zombie entries
Found root cause: No file locking causes race conditions. Analyzing full extent of corruption
Investigation complete. Root cause: race conditions from missing file locks. Documented 7 zombie agents, proposed fcntl-based locking solution with code examples in REGISTRY_CORRUPTION_ANALYSIS.md
